page.title: 18STONEYWOOD(ABERDEEN).
page.content: Stoneywood Mill is a paper mill. Some families have worked in it for three generations. The main water for the mill comes from a pond & a river. The Stoneywood Park is boring.There are only 8 swings & a tiny chute. Because of this people have signed a petition for more equipment, but it was ignored.There is plenty of grass & trees there which boys use as their goalposts.The council did erect goalp_ osts,but vandals pulled them down. The park was once a cattle market. Also farmers engaged seasonal farm hands there.It was called a "Feein Market".Market Street in Stoneywood got its name from this. Dyce Academy & Primary were built about ten years ago.Before that every_ one went to Bankhead Academy.Dyce Primary is one of the largest in Scot_ land.It has around 1000 pupils.
